ml.alternet.security.auth

Interface Hasher.Builder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Hasher.Configuration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Hasher.HasherBuilder
    Enclosing interface:
    Hasher

    public static interface Hasher.Builder
extends Hasher.Configuration
    Hasher builder. According to its configuration, it will build a concrete hasher.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ALGORITHM_PROPERTY_NAME
      The standard property name "algorithm"
      static String CHARSET_PROPERTY_NAME
      The standard property name "charset" ; default is "UTF-8"
      static String ENCODING_PROPERTY_NAME
      The standard property name "encoding" ; the value must be "base64", "hexa", "auto" (base64 for encoding, and automatic detection for decoding) or "none" (to get the UTF-8 bytes).
      static String HASH_BYTE_SIZE_PROPERTY_NAME
      The standard property name "hashByteSize" ; the value must be an Integer
      static String ITERATIONS_PROPERTY_NAME
      The standard property name "iterations" ; the value must be an Integer
      static String LOG_ROUNDS_PROPERTY_NAME
      The standard property name "logRounds" (for BCrypt only) ; the log2 of the number of rounds of hashing to apply - the work factor therefore increases as 2**log_rounds.
      static String SALT_BYTE_SIZE_PROPERTY_NAME
      The standard property name "saltByteSize" ; the value must be an Integer
      static String VARIANT_PROPERTY_NAME
      The standard property name "variant"

        static final String ENCODING_PROPERTY_NAME

      • LOG_ROUNDS_PROPERTY_NAME

        static final String LOG_ROUNDS_PROPERTY_NAME
        The standard property name "logRounds" (for BCrypt only) ; the log2 of the number of rounds of hashing to apply - the work factor therefore increases as 2**log_rounds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Build a concrete configured hasher.

      • configure

        Hasher.Builder configure(Properties properties)
                  throws InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Configure this builder with some properties.
        Parameters:
        properties - The set of properties.
        Returns:
        This builder.
        Throws:
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - When some parameters are invalid.

      • getConfiguration

        Hasher.Configuration getConfiguration()
        Return a snapshot of the configuration based on the current builder. Changes to this builder doesn't affect previous configuration.
        Returns:
        A snapshot configuration.

      • setLogRounds

        Hasher.Builder setLogRounds(int logRounds)
        Set the log rounds for BCrypt.
        Parameters:
        logRounds - For BCrypt algorithm only : the log2 of the number of rounds of hashing to apply - the work factor therefore increases as 2**log_rounds.
        Returns:
        This builder.
